DOC.brief_summary: The investigator suggest local endometrial injury use pipelle catheter perform follicular phase ( cycle day 5 , 6 7 ) stimulation cycle may improve pregnancy rate among patient undergo intrauterine insemination .
DOC.brief_title: Does Endometrial Injury Improve Intrauterine Insemination Outcome ?
DOC.detailed_description: In select group patient repeat implantation failure , endometrial injury precede cycle may improve ICSI outcome . Little known efficacy procedure improve intrauterine insemination outcome . Also little known effect procedure do stimulation cycle weather ICSI intrauterine insemination cycle .
DOC.criteria: 18 38 year . patent fallopian tune . mild male factor . anovulation . unexplained infertility . indication ICSI . evidence pelvic inflammatory disease .
